definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: Smoke escape emergency respirator masks are available in a wide variety of prices and weights.
sentences.chinese: 可以買到很多種價錢和重量的緊急防毒面具。

sentences.english: But he also liked wearing a gas mask while doing so.
sentences.chinese: 但他也喜歡騎車的同時帶一個防毒面具。

sentences.english: This gas mask can immunize you against poison gas.
sentences.chinese: 防毒面具能使你免遭毒氣襲擊。

sentences.english: He kept out deadly fumes wearing his own gas mask and sucked water from a lava tube.
sentences.chinese: 他帶着防毒面具將濃煙霧擋住，從熔岩管中吸水喝。

sentences.english: If only someone could now miniaturise gas masks.
sentences.chinese: 哈，現在就差有誰能夠搞個微縮版防毒面具出來。

sentences.english: Otherwise, but wearing gas masks, light drinking distilled water.
sentences.chinese: 否則，只好頭戴防毒面具，光喝蒸餾水了。

sentences.english: Xiao Ming learnt how to wear a gas mask when they were taught about fire protection.
sentences.chinese: 消防知識時，小明學會了如何戴防毒面具。

sentences.english: The Christmas comes. The Santa Claus wears the gas mask with the guns and bullets inside his gift bag.
sentences.chinese: 又是一個聖誕節，聖誕老人頭戴防毒面具，持槍荷彈。

sentences.english: The gas masks were collected last year because they were out of date.
sentences.chinese: 去年，這些防毒面具由於過了有效期而被收回。

sentences.english: Rehearse the moves of tightening an air mask and securing a flotation vest.
sentences.chinese: 演練戴緊防毒面具和固定安全背心。

sentences.english: They contrived a mask against poison gas.
sentences.chinese: 他們設計了一種防毒面具。

sentences.english: Plus gas mask and new Valentine's Day bandanna for all characters.
sentences.chinese: 另外防毒面具和新情人的所有字符日手帕。

definition: ventilator (artificial breathing apparatus used in hospitals)
